name: Roll-Chan
overview: In the year 20XX, Dr. Right's robots were kidnapped and reprogrammed by Dr. Wily to gain him world domination. In order to stop Dr. Wily and the reprogrammed Robot Masters, Dr. Right modified his robot assistant, Rock, into a super fighting robot. However, Rock was severely incapacitated with the Robot Masters onslaught. Nonetheless, Roll, Dr. Right's housekeeping robot and Rock's sister, presented herself and is willing to be modified for battle to save her brothers and save the world from Dr. Wily's evil scheme. Astounded by her compassion, Dr. Right transformed Roll into a super fighting robot girl! And so Roll-Chan was born!
